topic.title: Google Earth Engine need Gmail account
topic.text: Struggling to access the Google Earth Engine (GEE) Code Editor? Make sure you are using a personal Gmail Account. To access and unlock all the awesome features, make sure to register for GEE using your personal Gmail account instead of your UFL email. UF has it blocked to prevent billing etc.  Personal accounts play nicely with GEE and help you avoid any pesky blocks when creating cloud projects.  The cloud projects are free.
